turns.text: Genghis Khan was on of the greatest leaders of all time.

Yes I did know that and he came to power by uniting the nomadic tribes of Northeast Asia.
He would have never been able to take over the world. The celts in Scotland at the time would have smashed him. Interesting fact he had 13 kids.
How many wives?
I am not sure. All I know is he had 20 kids
